name: Gunship tanks vs Desert Biker Rider Rescue Police Car Games
name_original: Gunship tanks vs Desert Biker Rider Rescue Police Car Games
description:
Gunship tanks war is amazing 3d Battle between motor bike rider and enemy tanks in jungle city.Ride your heavy bike and dodge the incoming rockets and missiles coming towards you at high speed , don't try to stop your moto,if you will stop racing your bike missiles will hit you and you will loose this battle.

Avoid hitting the old sports car and police jeeps, best of luck for free style bike riding and self rescue game.
